LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.label: night elf
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.description: The Night Elves are a powerful and mystical race whose origins extend back to ancient times. These then-immortal beings were among the first to study magic and let it loose throughout the world nearly ten thousand years before the First War on Azeroth. The far-reaching and ancient legacy of the night elves shaped them into a race of very self-sufficient and self-conscious individuals, who often display strong streaks of isolationism.
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf.tools.3.label: head
